The Science of Mind: A Conversation with Dr. Larry Dossey
Join us for a conversation with Dr. Larry Dossey, author of The Science of Mind, as he discusses the latest research on the mind-body connection.
Dr. Dossey is a former professor of internal medicine at the University of Texas Health Science Center in San Antonio, Texas, and is the author of 13 books, including the New York Times bestseller One Mind: How Our Individual Mind Is Part of a Greater Consciousness and Why It Matters.
This event is free and open to the public. Seating is limited and available on a first-come, first-served basis.
The Science of Mind: A Conversation with Dr. Larry Dossey at Mary Baker Eddy Library
150 Hemenway Street, Boston, MA 02115

has been named the 2017 Laureus World Sportsman of the Year.
The Swiss tennis star, who won the Australian Open and Wimbledon in 2017, was presented with the award at the Laureus World Sports Awards in Monaco on Monday.
Federer, 36, beat off competition from Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton, Olympic champion Usain Bolt and golfer Dustin Johnson to win the award.
The 19-time Grand Slam champion has won the award three times before, in 2005, 2006 and 2007.
Federer said: "I'm very honoured to be here. I'm very happy to be here. I'm very happy to be in this company.
"I'm very happy to be in this position. I'm very happy to be in this room. I'm very happy to be in this moment.

’s ‘Interstellar’ Gets a New Trailer
Christopher Nolan’s Interstellar has been one of the most anticipated films of the year, and now we have a new trailer to get us even more excited.
The film stars Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain, Michael Caine, Casey Affleck, John Lithgow, Ellen Burstyn, and Topher Grace.
Interstellar is set to hit theaters on November 7th.
